com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Interface Actor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Alien, Tower, Unit, Weapon

    public interface Actor
    Interface implemented by the Unit and Tower classes. Used for entities within the game that can act and be destroyed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Dispose of unused resources
      boolean getExists()
      Returns the exist state of the Actor
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the Unit
      java.lang.String getName()
      Method for getting the name of the Actor.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the Unit
      int getX()
      Returns the X co-ordinate of the Unit
      int getY()
      Returns the Y co-ordinate of the Unit
      boolean isUnit()
      Returns whether the Actor is a Unit or not
      void render(float delta)
      Render the Actor.
      void setX(int x)
      Sets the X co-ordinate of the Unit
      void setY(int y)
      Sets the Y co-ordinate of the Unit
      void takeDamage(double damage)
      Causes the Units health to lower by the damage parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(float delta)
        Render the Actor.
        Parameters:
        delta - - The time in seconds since the last render.

      • getExists

        boolean getExists()
        Returns the exist state of the Actor
        Returns:
        true if the Actor exists, false if the Actor does not exist

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(double damage)
        Causes the Units health to lower by the damage parameter.
        Parameters:
        damage - Causes the Unit's health to deplete.
